characters.name: Nasa Yuzaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 169.5 cm
__Likes:__ Math, Physics, Finances

Kindhearted, charismatic, and intelligent, albeit only in certain areas. Nasa Yuzaki decided he had no need for a high school education, and, well, he was mostly right. He is the type of person who would worry if his friends got hurt when they tripped over a pebble, while he ended up falling down a cliff. He is very in love with his wife.

characters.name: Tsukasa Yuzaki
characters.description:
**Height**: 154 cm
**Relatives**: [Tokiko Tsukuyomi](https://anilist.co/character/188292/Tokiko-Tsukuyomi) (grandaunt), [Enishi Yuzaki](https://anilist.co/character/190386/Enishi-Yuzaki) (father-in-law), [Kanoka Yuzaki](https://anilist.co/character/190388/Kanoka-Yuzaki) (mother-in-law)

Tsukasa Yuzaki is the wife of [Nasa Yuzaki](https://anilist.co/character/130944/Nasa-Yuzaki). Not much is known about her, but what is known is that she's mysteriously cute.

Tsukasa has long pink hair with a clasp on the back and pink-red eyes. She wears elegant clothing and a skirt. While at home she is usually seen wearing modern clothing. During her trip to Kyoto, she wore a floral Yukata.

Tsukasa comes across as calm and level-headed; seemingly unsurprised by Nasa's rash and illogical actions. Despite this, she agreed to marry him and love him dearly. She gets embarrassed easily whenever Nasa proclaims his love towards her and how cute she is. She has a huge love for movies, games, and pop-culture. She has a wide range of knowledge concerning aspects of Japanese history. This includes how to handle a Katana properly and information regarding various locations and landmarks. Tsukasa talks about such things as if she had experienced them herself but never elaborates.

~!Tsukasa is immortal and over 1400 years old, but maintains the appearance as a 16-year-old girl.!~

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki, edited)

characters.name: Kaname Arisugawa
characters.description: She's been helping the bathhouse for a long time. Despite being young, she is very mature and always gives good suggestions to [Nasa](https://anilist.co/character/130944/Nasa-Yuzaki) to help him out with his couple life. Like her mom, she really likes dirty jokes and apparently, she has no fear of cleaning the males' bath while Nasa is in there. She isn't shy and prefers a direct approach.

characters.name: Aya Arisugawa
characters.description: She is [Kaname](https://anilist.co/character/137513/Kaname-Arisugawa)'s older sister. She is a lazy ditz but, [Kaname](https://anilist.co/character/137513/Kaname-Arisugawa) considers her on the "genius side" for her great learning capacity. In contrast with that, she usually misunderstands important things and she gets really confused in the blink of an eye. Her favorite hobby is probably playing video games and she usually nags [Kaname](https://anilist.co/character/137513/Kaname-Arisugawa) into playing with her.

characters.name: Chitose Kaginoji
characters.description:
Apparently, [Tsukasa](https://anilist.co/character/131106/Tsukasa-Yuzaki) saved her from falling off a cliff when they were children. Chitose wants to use her own life for the sake of [Tsukasa](https://anilist.co/character/131106/Tsukasa-Yuzaki) to pay her back. She obviously doesn't want [Tsukasa](https://anilist.co/character/131106/Tsukasa-Yuzaki) falling into [Nasa](https://anilist.co/character/130944/Nasa-Yuzaki)'s hands. She has two maids: [Aurora](https://anilist.co/character/137516/Aurora) and [Charlotte](https://anilist.co/character/137517/Charlotte). Chitose has a personality that quickly bends from being strong to whining. She considers [Tsukasa](https://anilist.co/character/131106/Tsukasa-Yuzaki) her sister.

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wikia)

characters.name: Aurora
characters.description:
She is one of [Chitose](https://anilist.co/character/137515/Chitose-Kaginoji)'s maids. She is usually serious and cold-minded. Probably the exact opposite personality of [Charlotte](https://anilist.co/character/137517/Charlotte): the second maid of [Chitose](https://anilist.co/character/137515/Chitose-Kaginoji). She always appears with [Charlotte](https://anilist.co/character/137517/Charlotte) and she usually tries to stop her from being too impulsive. 

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wikia)

characters.name: Charlotte
characters.description: She is one of [Chitose](https://anilist.co/character/137515/Chitose-Kaginoji)'s maids. She quickly changes her personality from being simple-minded and innocent to going berserk with a giant sword in her hands. However, she is always happy with a big smile on her face. She will probably do everything [Chitose](https://anilist.co/character/137515/Chitose-Kaginoji) tells her to do without hesitation.

characters.name: Naoko Yanagi
characters.description: She is a teacher from the middle school that [Nasa](https://anilist.co/character/130944/Nasa-Yuzaki) had frequented. She is always super busy with work and doesn't have much time for her life. However, once she sees how happy [Nasa](https://anilist.co/character/130944/Nasa-Yuzaki)'s marriage is, she becomes more open to future relationships. She considers herself a boring person.

characters.name: Kyuuma Kagami
characters.description:
She is Kaname's classmate and is always looking for her. She lacks logic and always draws queer conclusions. In a word: a klutz.

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki)

characters.name: Ouka Nakiri
characters.description:
She was Nasa's classmate in middle school and is the same age as him. She currently owns an electronics store and apparently, she doesn't have any clear desire for affective relationships.

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki)

characters.name: Kaguya Gekkou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 143 cm

She is a senior high school student and has very long hair. She is very clever. Indeed, she can easily compute the trajectory of a rocket heading for the moon.

She can be described as a sociopath since she doesn't really care about or understand people's morals or emotions. Everything can be explained by logic.

characters.name: Ginga Onimaru
characters.description:
He is not a Yakuza, but everything about him recalls one. Indeed he always dresses as such and often changes normal terms with words more shadier and fishy. Besides that, he is a high school student and Nasa's cousin.

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki)

characters.name: Yaiba Shirogane
characters.description:
She is a 16-year-old girl attending Otogi all-girls high school and she is the class representative.

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki)

characters.name: Haru Miyako
characters.description:
She is a 16-year-old girl attending Otogi all-girls high school. Her parents are very wealthy and she is an honour student at school. She really likes ramen and has a blog about it.

(Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki)

characters.name: Tokiko Tsukuyomi
characters.description:
She was the minister of education, but she resigned a few days after Nasa and Tsukasa married. As for why she says she is worried about her health and she may no longer be involved in politics due to her age. She has great influence and power. Indeed, she easily tracks down Tsukasa's location while she was still living in Nasa's apartment.

~!She later dies a natural death.!~
